home.slogan: Create appointments and get on the same page with your people!
home.testEnvironmentBanner: This is a test environment of {{value}}. Please do not fill in personal data.

poll.paused: You can't edit this poll, because it's paused.
poll.continueEverytime: You can continue this poll at anytime.
poll.addDetails: Add further details to your poll!
poll.editAlert: Attention, you are editing a running poll.
poll.editSaveLastStep: In step "4" you can save your changes.
poll.downloadIcs: Download this date as .ics-File to import it to your calendar. Check the voting of your participants in the description.
poll.downloadCsv: Download the table of participants and their voting. You can import it into Excel and plan your event.

delete.willBeDeleted: The appointment request is deleted one week after the last possible appointment date.

date.startInvalid: Please set a valid start date.
date.startFuture: Please set a start date, wich is in the future.
date.startAfterEnd: Please set a valid start and end date combination. The end date must be after the start date.
date.noStart: Please set a start date. If there is an end date, there has to be a start date.
date.inPast: Please enter a valid start date. The start date must be in the future.
date.noValue: There must be at least one date.
date.tooManyValues: More than 100 dates are not possible.

plainLanguage.content:
Welcome.
You can find information about Termin-Finder / appointment-finder in plain language here.
All people can understand texts in plain language better.

about.content:
This text is about a program on the Internet.
The program is called: Termin-Finder / appointment-finder.

Do you want to make an appointment 
with colleagues or business partners?
For example, a company outing or meeting?
Then you can use the appointment-finder.
We explain how you can use the appointment-finder.

howto.header: 2. How to use the appointment finder

0.content: Go to the start page of the appointment-finder. Give your appointment a name. For example: Company outing. Then you must agree to the privacy declaration and the terms of service. The Create poll item is then given a color. Click on the Create poll item. Then we continue.

1.content: Enter your first name and last name. And the title for your appointment. You do not have to fill in the other fields. Then click on Next to select an appointment.

2.content:
Enter the options for the poll. 
For example, the times, the days and the date.

3.content: If you want, you can enter a password for your poll. All participants must then enter the password before they can take part in your poll. Do you want to enter a password for your poll? Then click on the box on the right-hand side. Did you enter a password? Then click on the item Next. Do you not want to enter a password? Then simply click on the Next item, without entering a password.

4.content: Now you can check again what you have entered. Do you want to improve something? Then click on the Revise item. Are you done? Then click on Start poll. You will get 2 links. With the first link you can invite participants to your poll. With the other link you can change things in the poll. Important: Save the links before you leave the website. Otherwise the links will be lost and you will have to redo the poll.

declarationOnAccessibility.header: 3. Information about the declaration on accessibility
declarationOnAccessibility.content: You will find the declaration on accessibility at the bottom of the start page. The declaration on accessibility lists all barriers that exist on the website. It also explains why these barriers exist. Barriers on the Internet site are the things why some people find an Internet site difficult to use. For example, if the font is too small. Or if texts are not available in plain language. Click on the item Accessibility. Then you can read the declaration on accessibility. Have you found barriers that are not in the accessibility statement? Then you can report these barriers. To do this, contact the complaints office listed in the declaration on accessibility.

signLanguage.content: This is where we publish information about our website in sign language.

links.satisfactionSurvey: How satisfied is our service? Do you have any suggestions for making the service more enjoyable? We would be pleased if you would let us know your opinion with a few clicks. Your feedback will be collected by the development team at Dataport AÃ¶R.

Secure your poll with a password!
